bug.author: lastzero
bug.summary: Inception V3 model uses 299px resolution, not just 224px
bug.description: Our model expects to get square 299x299 RGB images, right now we use 224px as this was the case for a different model. Needs to be fixed. Ideally we can reuse the 299px thumbnail for other tasks like color indexing.

comments.comment: Apparently we were using Inception V1, not V3. That explains the difference. Bad memory.
